mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran (id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime) values (#{id}, #{owner}, #{money}, #{name}, #{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{editBy}, #{editTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_tran t join tbl_contacts con on t.contactsId = con.id join tbl_customer cus on t.customerId = cus.id
t.owner like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and t.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and cus.name like '%' #{customerName} '%'
and con.owner like '%' #{contactsName} '%'
limit #{skipCount} , #{pageSize}
